resources.string:
This app can be used to
1) Look up a specific restaurant\'s grades and violations history.
2) Search for a restaurant by name, cuisine, address or phone number.*
3) Run reports showing various aspects about the data.

*If you are primarily interested in using this as a search tool, you can make the search screen the default by going into the setting option in the home screen menu.

This application looks up restaurant grade information and generates reports provided by the NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene(DOHMH). That agency is responsible for inspecting eating establishments and providing a letter grade to them.
Here is a link to their grading pdf document:
